name: Star Shooter (Nomppie)
description:
The galaxy is under attack!

It's up to you to defeat the invaders. Don't let them pass through! Shoot them down with your blasters and upgrade your ship to become more powerful and reach higher scores!

  • Infinite shoot-em-up
  • Use your score to buy upgrades for your ship
  • Reach higher and higher scores and share on twitter! (@nomppie)

Controls:

Use your finger (or click your mouse) to guide your ship through the onslaught of bullets.

* * Get the full experience on Android devices!! * *
